creator: bassem.baraya@mubasher.info
text:
I used to run jmeter v3.1  using sudo sh /pathToJmeterDirectory/jmeter.sh -n -t /jmxDirectory/visitingPortalUrls.jmx

But lately after upgrading to 3.2 I got the following response for each http request in the test plan

responseCode	responseMessage
Non HTTP response code: java.lang.NullPointerException	Non HTTP response message: null
Non HTTP response code: java.lang.NullPointerException	Non HTTP response message: null

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please use user mailing list:
http://jmeter.apache.org/mail.html

Thank you
